title: OSVR Display Descriptor
description: This schema documents and guides creation of a display descriptor, that describes properties of a head-mounted display

fieldOfView.title: HMD Field of View Description
fieldOfView.description: Defines the optical parameters of the HMD. Since some HMDs have partial overlap – meaning that the viewing direction of the left and right eye are not identical – we define the field of view of just one eye and then the overlap between them.

pitchTilt.title: Pitch tilt in degrees
pitchTilt.description: Some HMDs have their field of view tilted downwards. In this case, pitchTilt would have a non-zero value in degrees, where positive is a downward tilt.

resolutions.title: HMD Resolution Description
resolutions.description: Describes HMD properties related to resolution.

width.title: Horizontal size, in pixels, of entire video signal

height.title: Vertical size, in pixels, of entire video signal

videoInputs.title: Number of distinct video inputs
videoInputs.description: Some HMDs have 2 separate inputs, one for each eye.

displayMode.title: Display Mode
displayMode.description: horzSideBySide, vertSideBySide, or fullScreen. If a single input is used in side-by-side mode, width and height show the entire width and height of both sides combined.

distortion.title: HMD Distortion Description
distortion.description: Describes HMD properties related to distortion shader.

rendering.title: HMD Rendering Description
rendering.description: Describes HMD properties related to rendering.

eyes.title: HMD Eyes Description
eyes.description: Describes HMD properties related to eyes.

rotate180.title: Flip Display Rotation
rotate180.description: Indicates if the view needs to flipped 180 degrees on the z axis.
